name.baseName: 煤炭井工开采;开采煤炭

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: According to the requirements of the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change ( IPCC ) revised guidelines in 1996, the methane emission from underground mining, open-pit mining and post-mining activities in China was estimated. After deducting the use of methane in methane extraction, the amount of methane discharged into the atmosphere by coal mines was obtained.
按照政府间气候变化工作组(IPCC)1996年修订指南的要求,对我国地下开采、露天开采 和矿后活动甲烷涌出量进行了估算,扣除抽放甲烷中利用甲烷后,得出煤矿排入大气的甲烷量。

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: Methane emission during underground coal mining in central-south China in 1994.
1994年“中国中南”地区井工煤矿开采过程甲烷排放。

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: The amount of methane discharged into the atmosphere from coal mines in China in 1994 and 2000 was investigated and studied. Through the collation and analysis of a large number of mine gas grade identification data of state-owned key, state-owned local and township coal mines, the amount of methane drainage and utilization in mines was investigated, and some laboratory measurements were supplemented. On this basis, in accordance with the IPCC Guidelines for the revision of the second.
对1994年和2000年我国煤矿排入大气的甲烷量进行了调查研究, 通过对国有重点、国有地方和乡镇煤矿大量矿井瓦斯等级鉴定资料的整理分析, 矿井甲烷抽放量和利用量的调研,以及补充进行某些试验室测定工作。在此基础上, 按照IPCC 修订指南所提第2种方法即平均排放系数法, 分别求出我国各大区域的煤产量加权平均甲烷系数及我国各大区域煤矿开采过程甲烷排放系数。
technology.technologicalApplicability: The described process relates to the underground coal mining industry in the central-south region of China specifically detailed for the year 1994. This data set is used for assessing methane emissions associated with coal extraction activities. Methane emissions data is crucial for understanding the environmental impact of coal mining operations and for devising strategies to mitigate greenhouse gas release. This data can be used by environmental researchers, policy makers, and industries to monitor and report on emission trends, and is applicable for climate change studies, carbon footprint calculations, and the creation of emissions inventories.
该描述的过程涉及1994年中国中南地区的地下煤炭开采产业。该数据集用于评估与煤炭提取活动相关的甲烷排放量。甲烷排放数据对于了解煤矿作业的环境影响以及制定减轻温室气体释放策略至关重要。该数据可供环境研究者、政策制定者和行业使用，用于监测和报告排放趋势，并适用于气候变化研究、碳足迹计算和创建排放清单。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: Users should employ the provided data with caution, ensuring its application is limited to the methodological and geographical context specified, namely, methane emissions from underground coal mining in central-south China during 1994. When integrating this data into broader life cycle assessments, users must account for temporal and regional limitations. The IPCC Guidelines revised methodology, specifically the use of the average emission coefficient method, should be adhered to when calculating emissions. Users should also note the absence of subsequent operational or post-operational data, as the study concentrates on the emission factors relevant to the 1994 and 2000 time frame.
用户应谨慎使用提供的数据，确保其应用仅限于指定的方法学和地理背景，即1994年中国中南地区地下煤炭开采的甲烷排放。在将此数据集成到更广泛的生命周期评估中时，用户必须考虑时间和区域限制。在计算排放量时，应坚持遵循IPCC修订的指南方法，特别是使用平均排放系数法。用户还应注意，由于研究集中在1994年和2000年的排放因子，因此缺乏随后的操作或后操作数据。

completeness.common:other: The output stream is dominated by ' CH4 ', and there is no input stream.
输出流以“CH4”为主，无输入流。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: The literature does not explain the amount of coal input. Assume : the amount of coal input : output = 1 : 1.
文献中没有说明煤炭的投入量，假设：煤炭的投入量:产出量=1:1
Coal production in the process of underground coal mining in central and southern China in 1994.
1994年中国中南地区井工煤矿开采过程中煤炭产量。

Emission factor, the methane emission coefficient during underground coal mining in central and southern China in 1994, that is, "the volume of methane released per kilogram of coal mined."Methane emissions from underground coal mining in central and southern China in 1994 ( methane emission coefficient 7.19 m3 / t * coal output 154.46 Mt ) ; the original text does not distinguish the flow of bio and fossil, which is judged by experts to be fossil.
1994年中国中南地区井工煤矿开采过程中甲烷排放量(甲烷排放系数7.19m3/t*煤炭产量154.46Mt所得结果);原文未区分bio和fossil的流，根据专家判断此处为fossil。
